job_description:
Job Title: Software Development Intern
Team: Flocci (www.flocci.in)
Type: Internship (Full-time)
Duration: 3–6 months
Location: Remote / Hybrid
Stipend: Performance-based (PPO opportunities available)

About Flocci

Flocci builds AI-first business applications that streamline recruitment, HR operations, and real-time marketplaces. Our platforms are designed for scale, rapid experimentation, and high ownership. We are a remote-first, engineering-led startup where interns contribute to production code from day one.

What You'll Work On

- Contribute to building and scaling our internal talent management platform, Flocci Talent
- Develop scalable microservices, backend APIs, and user-facing interfaces
- Design, query, and manage relational databases (PostgreSQL/Supabase)
- Integrate AI/ML APIs and tools (OpenAI, Gemini, LangChain, etc.)
- Build dashboards, automation tools, and internal applications
- Work on features involving natural language processing (NLP), data extraction, and smart filtering
- Participate in architecture and product discussions

Core Technical Skills

- Strong programming skills in JavaScript and Python
- Experience with React.js, Node.js, Express.js, Tailwind CSS
- Proficiency in writing complex SQL queries
- Understanding of RESTful API design, backend logic, and authentication
- Familiarity with PostgreSQL and cloud-hosted DB platforms like Supabase
- Git version control and collaborative workflows using GitHub
- Ability to write clean, maintainable, and testable code

Bonus / Preferred Skills

- Understanding of microservice architectures and event-driven systems
- Experience working with large datasets or building data pipelines
- Knowledge of AI/ML libraries (like scikit-learn, TensorFlow, or Hugging Face Transformers)
- Hands-on with AI toolchains such as LangChain, OpenAI APIs, or vector databases
- Experience building or consuming webhooks, background jobs, and cron systems
- Exposure to deployment and CI/CD platforms (Vercel, Railway, Render)

Tools & Technologies

- Frontend: React, Tailwind CSS, Vite
- Backend: Node.js, Express, Python (optional)
- Database: PostgreSQL, Supabase
- Deployment: Render, Railway, Vercel
- Dev Tools: GitHub, Postman, Notion, Figma
- AI Tools: OpenAI, Gemini, LangChain, GPT-4, Pinecone

Soft Skills & Traits

- Strong problem-solving and system design thinking
- High ownership, self-driven, and fast learner
- Curiosity about how things work — from UI to database
- Passion for building, automating, or optimizing real systems
- Comfort working in remote, async-first teams

Ideal For

- Final-year computer science students or early graduates
- Self-taught developers with strong project portfolios
- Engineers looking to work at the intersection of software and AI

How to Apply

- Submit your resume, portfolio links, and GitHub
- Highlight 1–2 personal or open-source projects you’re proud of
- If you’ve explored our website or products, include your feedback or improvement ideas

screening_result.detailed_feedback:
Eesha possesses a solid foundation in Python and database management, which are valuable assets. Her cover letter demonstrates a genuine interest in learning and contributing to innovative projects. While she lacks experience with our specific tech stack (React, Node.js), her enthusiasm and willingness to learn make her a promising candidate. The interview should focus on assessing her problem-solving skills, understanding of software development principles, and her ability to quickly learn new technologies. Exploring her projects in detail will help gauge her code quality and understanding of best practices. Her AI/ML potential is based on her general interest and willingness to learn, which needs to be explored further in the interview.

[BIAS CORRECTION APPLIED: ]
screening_result.growth_potential: Eesha shows a strong desire to learn and adapt, as evidenced by her cover letter. With mentorship and exposure to our tech stack, she has the potential to quickly pick up the necessary skills and contribute meaningfully.
screening_result.transferable_skills: Eesha's Python and SQL skills are directly transferable to backend development tasks. Her internship experience, even if not directly aligned with our stack, demonstrates an understanding of software development workflows and collaboration.

screening_result.detailed_feedback: Satyam presents a promising profile with a good foundation in full-stack development. His enthusiasm and willingness to learn are valuable assets. While his experience with AI/ML and complex problem-solving is limited, his transferable skills and potential for growth make him a worthwhile candidate for an interview. During the interview, we should delve deeper into his project experience, problem-solving approach, and understanding of system design principles.
screening_result.growth_potential: Satyam's cover letter highlights his curiosity and desire to learn, which are strong indicators of growth potential. With mentorship and exposure to our tech stack and AI/ML tools, he has the potential to quickly adapt and contribute meaningfully to the team.
screening_result.transferable_skills: Satyam's full-stack experience with Javascript, React, Node.js, and CSS provides a solid foundation for contributing to our frontend and backend development. His familiarity with Git and GitHub is also valuable. While he may need to learn specific tools like Supabase and Tailwind CSS, his existing skills are highly transferable.

screening_result.detailed_feedback:
Aastha is an enthusiastic candidate with a diverse skillset and a clear interest in technology. Her background in UI/UX design and data analytics, combined with her programming skills in Python, SQL, HTML, CSS, Javascript, and React.js, makes her a potentially valuable asset to the team. While she lacks specific experience in backend development and AI/ML, her eagerness to learn and her strong foundation in programming fundamentals suggest that she has the potential to quickly adapt and contribute to our projects. The interview should focus on assessing her problem-solving skills, her understanding of software development principles, and her willingness to learn new technologies. We should also explore her project portfolio to understand the depth of her experience and her ability to write clean, maintainable code.

[BIAS CORRECTION APPLIED: ]
screening_result.growth_potential: Aastha demonstrates a multidisciplinary learning approach and a willingness to explore different technologies. With focused mentorship and opportunities to apply her skills in backend development and AI/ML, she has the potential to grow into a well-rounded software developer.
screening_result.transferable_skills: Aastha's UI/UX design skills and data analytics interest can be valuable for building user-friendly interfaces and understanding data-driven insights within our talent management platform. Her cloud fundamentals knowledge is a good starting point for understanding our deployment environment.

screening_result.detailed_feedback: Kajal is a motivated BCA student with a clear interest in web development. Her internship experience demonstrates a basic understanding of front-end technologies. While her current technical skills are limited, her enthusiasm, teamwork abilities, and disciplined approach suggest a good learning potential. An interview would be valuable to assess her problem-solving skills and her ability to quickly grasp new concepts. We should explore her understanding of programming fundamentals beyond HTML and her willingness to learn backend technologies and AI/ML concepts. Her 'Well-Disciplined Student' award suggests she is coachable and willing to learn.
screening_result.growth_potential: Kajal demonstrates a strong interest in technology and a willingness to learn. With focused mentorship and opportunities to work on challenging projects, she has the potential to grow significantly in her technical abilities. Her adaptability will be key to her success.
screening_result.transferable_skills: Kajal's HTML skills and understanding of front-end development principles are transferable. Her teamwork and management skills can be valuable in a collaborative environment. Her disciplined approach to learning will be beneficial in acquiring new skills.

areas_for_development: Practical experience with relevant frameworks (React, Node.js)
Deeper understanding of RESTful APIs and backend development
Project experience demonstrating code quality and problem-solving
screening_result.detailed_feedback:
Anish is a motivated candidate with a good foundation in programming fundamentals and an interest in AI/ML. While he lacks direct experience with our specific tech stack, his transferable skills and eagerness to learn make him worth interviewing. During the interview, we should focus on assessing his problem-solving abilities, understanding of software development principles, and willingness to learn quickly. Providing him with a small coding challenge related to API integration or database querying would be beneficial.

[BIAS CORRECTION APPLIED: ]
screening_result.growth_potential: Anish demonstrates a strong desire to learn and is pursuing relevant skills. With guidance and practical experience, he has the potential to quickly adapt to our tech stack and contribute meaningfully.
screening_result.transferable_skills: Anish's knowledge of Java, Python, and SQL provides a solid foundation for learning JavaScript, Node.js, and PostgreSQL. His understanding of OOPS concepts is directly applicable to backend development. Cloud knowledge (AWS, Azure, GCP) is a plus, even if not directly used in the internship.

screening_result.detailed_feedback:
Rupesh has a foundation in Python and SQL, which are valuable assets. His experience at Code Alpha provides some real-world project experience. However, he lacks experience with the core technologies used at Flocci, such as React.js, Node.js, and AI/ML tools. An interview would be beneficial to assess his programming fundamentals, problem-solving abilities, and learning agility in more detail. We need to gauge his ability to quickly pick up new technologies and his passion for AI. His cover letter is generic and doesn't demonstrate specific interest in Flocci or its products. During the interview, explore his projects in detail to understand his coding style and problem-solving approach.

[BIAS CORRECTION APPLIED: Corrected tech stack rigidity penalty]
screening_result.growth_potential: Rupesh demonstrates a willingness to learn and is described as a self-learner. With focused mentorship and opportunities to work on relevant projects, he has the potential to quickly acquire the necessary skills in React.js, Node.js, and AI/ML.
screening_result.transferable_skills: Rupesh's Python and SQL skills are directly transferable to backend development tasks. His experience with data processing and automation can be valuable for building internal tools and data pipelines.

screening_result.detailed_feedback:
Aditya possesses a broad range of technical skills and has demonstrated initiative through personal projects. His AI assistant project is particularly interesting and aligns with our company's focus. However, the short tenure at Trifecta Adatto and the somewhat generic cover letter raise concerns about commitment and communication skills. An interview is recommended to assess his understanding of software development best practices, his ability to articulate technical concepts, and his genuine interest in our company and the role. The code quality of his projects should be evaluated during the interview process. The cultural fit score is low due to the lack of demonstrated passion in the application. This can be explored further in the interview.

[BIAS CORRECTION APPLIED: ]
screening_result.growth_potential: Aditya demonstrates a willingness to learn and explore new technologies. His project portfolio showcases initiative and a desire to build practical applications. With mentorship and guidance, he has the potential to quickly adapt to our tech stack and contribute meaningfully to the team.
key_strengths: Project experience in AI and networking
screening_result.transferable_skills: Aditya's skills in Python, Javascript, and API development are directly transferable to the role. His experience with databases (MySQL) provides a foundation for learning PostgreSQL/Supabase. His project experience, particularly the AI assistant, demonstrates an interest in the intersection of software and AI.

screening_result.detailed_feedback:

While he lacks direct experience with the specific technologies used at Flocci (React.js, Node.js, PostgreSQL, AI/ML), his transferable skills and learning agility make him a promising candidate. An interview would be valuable to assess his willingness and ability to learn these technologies quickly. His experience automating tasks and deployments is highly relevant to the role.

[BIAS CORRECTION APPLIED: ]
screening_result.growth_potential: Arpit demonstrates a clear ability to learn new technologies and adapt to different environments. His experience in various roles and projects suggests a strong learning trajectory. With focused effort, he can quickly acquire the necessary skills in React.js, Node.js, and AI/ML to contribute effectively to the team.
key_strengths: Strong DevOps experience with Kubernetes and Docker
Experience with multiple programming languages (Java, Bash, Perl, JS)
screening_result.transferable_skills: Arpit's experience with Java, Bash, and JavaScript provides a solid foundation for learning React.js and Node.js. His DevOps experience with Kubernetes and Docker is highly valuable for building and deploying microservices. His experience with automating tasks will be directly applicable to building automation tools and internal applications.

areas_for_development: Deeper understanding of backend frameworks like Node.js/Express.js

While she lacks direct experience with our specific tech stack (React, Node.js, PostgreSQL, AI toolchains), her transferable skills and demonstrated learning ability make her a good candidate for an internship. The interview should focus on assessing her problem-solving skills, her understanding of backend concepts, and her willingness to learn new technologies. Providing her with a small coding challenge related to API integration or data manipulation would be beneficial.

[BIAS CORRECTION APPLIED: ]
screening_result.growth_potential: Komal demonstrates a high learning agility and a strong interest in both frontend development and data science. With focused mentorship and opportunities to work on real-world projects, she has the potential to quickly learn our tech stack and contribute meaningfully to the team. screening_result.detailed_feedback:
Harsh has a solid foundation in programming fundamentals and backend development, particularly with Java and Spring Boot. His AI/ML projects demonstrate an interest in the field. While he lacks direct experience with our core frontend technologies (React/JavaScript), his strong programming skills and enthusiasm for learning make him a promising candidate. An interview would allow us to assess his adaptability and problem-solving skills in more detail. We should probe his understanding of Javascript and his willingness to learn React quickly. His project descriptions could be more detailed, especially regarding the challenges he faced and how he overcame them.

[BIAS CORRECTION APPLIED: ]
screening_result.growth_potential: Harsh demonstrates a strong learning trajectory through his diverse projects and hackathon achievements. His willingness to learn new technologies and contribute to a mission-driven product suggests a high potential for growth within Flocci.
key_strengths: Experience with Spring Boot and REST APIs
Enthusiasm for AI/ML and its applications
screening_result.transferable_skills: Harsh's experience with Java, Spring Boot, and REST APIs is directly transferable to building backend services with Node.js and Express. His SQL skills are also valuable for working with PostgreSQL/Supabase. His AI/ML project experience demonstrates an interest in the field, which can be leveraged for integrating AI tools.

screening_result.detailed_feedback: Kushal is a promising candidate with a strong academic background and a demonstrated aptitude for programming and problem-solving. His automation project is a good start, but we need to assess the code quality and design choices during the interview. His passion for AI and his analytical abilities are strong positives. We should explore his willingness to learn and his ability to work in a fast-paced, remote environment.

screening_result.growth_potential: Avinash demonstrates a willingness to learn and apply his skills through personal projects and teaching. With mentorship and exposure to backend technologies and AI/ML concepts, he has the potential to quickly adapt and contribute to Flocci's projects.

screening_result.growth_potential: Shivam demonstrates high growth potential due to his expressed curiosity and desire to learn. With mentorship and hands-on experience, he can quickly develop the necessary skills to contribute meaningfully to the team.

screening_result.transferable_skills: Shivam's expressed willingness to learn and adapt, coupled with his foundational knowledge of React/JavaScript, provides a base to build upon. His curiosity is a valuable asset that can be channeled into rapidly acquiring new skills.

While his achievements are impressive, it's crucial to assess his practical coding skills and project experience during the interview.

screening_result.transferable_skills: Mintu's problem-solving skills and familiarity with multiple programming languages are transferable. His Java and Python experience can be leveraged for backend development with Node.js and Python (optional). Data analysis skills are also relevant.
